item.title: Comparative Study of Large Language Model Evaluation Frameworks
item.description: A comprehensive analysis of evaluation frameworks for LLMs, focusing on bias detection, response quality, and robustness.

item.title: Understanding DeepEval's Bias Evaluation Methodology
item.description: A deep dive into DeepEval's methodology for bias detection in LLM-generated text, covering opinion extraction, structured evaluation, and scoring.

item.title: Accelerating Transformer Attention with Custom CUDA Kernels
item.description: An in-depth performance analysis of PyTorch's MultiheadAttention module, identifying computational bottlenecks and optimizing CUDA kernels for efficient GPU utilization.

item.title: The Turing Test: Detecting LLM-Generated Content
item.description: A research project exploring methods for detecting AI-generated text, benchmarking existing detection models, and developing a robust classifier to distinguish human-written and LLM-generated content.

item.title: Speech Emotion Recognitiong
item.description: A deep learning-based approach to classifying human emotions from speech audio recordings using convolutional and recurrent neural networks.

item.title: Location
item.description: Professor Dr von Igelfeld's mailing and office addresses at the Institute of Romance Philology.

item.title: Office Hours
item.description: Schedule and location for Professor Dr von Igelfeld's office hours.

item.title: List of Irregular Verbs Across Romance Languages
item.description: This dataset contains all irregular verbs in known Romance languages.

item.title: Portugese Irregular Verbs
item.description: This book discusses Portugese irregular verbs in great details.
